meanings: (덧대다) apply, fix, put sth over[on] sth
(공급하다) supply (sth to sb / sb with sth), provide (sth for sb / sb with sth), (자금·경비 등을) pay, finance

phrases.phrase: 꼬르륵 대는 개울 옆에서 잠시 쉬다
meanings: rest a while by a babbling brook
